mapper.select: SELECT atr.tour_idx ,atr.tour_title , atr.tour_view_cnt , DATE_FORMAT(atr.tour_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS tour_reg_dt , IF(atr.tour_use != 'N', '사용', '미사용') AS tour_use FROM ad_tour atr

SELECT atr.tour_idx ,atr.tour_title , atr.tour_subtitle , atr.tour_contents , atr.tour_image , atr.tour_view_cnt , DATE_FORMAT(atr.tour_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS tour_reg_dt , IF(atr.tour_use != 'N', '사용', '미사용') AS tour_use FROM ad_tour atr WHERE atr.tour_idx = #{tour_idx}

SELECT ab.bn_idx , ab.bn_img , ab.bn_title , ab.bn_url FROM ad_banner ab WHERE (DATE_FORMAT(ab.bn_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d')) = (SELECT MAX(DATE_FORMAT(bn2.bn_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d')) FROM ad_banner bn2) AND ab.bn_use = 'Y' ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(ab.bn_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d')
SELECT ass.stp_nm , IF(ass.stp_use != 'N', '사용', '미사용') AS stp_use , ass.stp_give , ass.stp_contents FROM ad_stamp_set ass LEFT JOIN ad_store st ON ass.str_idx = st.str_idx WHERE stp_lang_type = 'ko'

SELECT am.mb_nickname , ass.stp_nm , asl.stp_status , asl.stp_s_date , asl.stp_e_date FROM ad_stamp_list asl LEFT JOIN ad_stamp_set ass ON ass.stp_idx = asl.stp_idx LEFT JOIN ad_member am ON asl.mb_idx = am.mb_idx GROUP BY ass.str_idx , am.mb_idx

SELECT afl.fcm_type , DATE_FORMAT(afl.push_log_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS push_log_time , push_content , IF(fi.mb_idx != 0,'회원', '비회원') AS user_type FROM ad_fcm_logs afl LEFT JOIN fcm_info fi ON fi.fcm_idx = afl.fcm_idx WHERE afl.fcm_type = 'push' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(afl.push_log_time , '%Y-%m-%d')
SELECT ps_idx , ps_title , ps_regdate , ps_use , ps_content FROM ad_pass_set aps WHERE mb_idx = 0

SELECT am.mb_nickname , ap.post_title , ap.post_content , ap.post_reg_date , ap.post_reg_time , ap.post_update , ap.post_uptime FROM ad_posting ap LEFT JOIN ad_member am ON am.mb_idx = ap.mb_idx WHERE ap.post_status = 'Y'
